rules: Rule1: Either the stream is live or the tournament is successful.
Rule2: Provided that the match needs an update, the schedule is finalized or it is not approved.
Rule3: The match needs an update or requires a revision.
Rule4: Whenever the match requires a revision, the schedule is finalized or it is not the case that the schedule is approved.
Rule5: If the event is scheduled, then the tournament is successful.
Rule6: Under the condition that the event is cancelled, the event is postponed.
Rule7: Provided that the game has a venue, the venue has capacity.
Rule8: The game has a venue or, if the event is cancelled, it is not postponed.
Rule9: Whenever the venue has capacity, the venue meets requirements.
Rule10: Under the condition that the venue meets requirements, the venue has equipment.
Rule11: If the venue meets requirements, then the venue has internet.
Rule12: Whenever the team requires transport, the vehicle has insurance.
Rule13: Provided that the team requires transport, it is not the case that the vehicle has a driver.
Rule14: Either the team requires transport or the platform does not support recording.
Rule15: If the team has transport, then it is not the case that the team requires transport.
Rule16: Under the condition that the team arrives on time, the tournament is successful.
Rule17: The team arrives on time or has a delay.
Rule18: Provided that the team has a delay, the team makes setup.
Rule19: Whenever the team makes setup, the team is ready.
Rule20: If the stream requires a backup, then the stream has an issue or it is not live.
Rule21: Either the stream requires a backup or the stream uses a secondary option.
Rule22: Under the condition that the match has a conflict, the match needs rescheduling.
Rule23: Provided that the match requires adjustment, the schedule is finalized or it is not the case that the schedule is approved.
Rule24: If the venue has internet, then the venue has power.
Rule25: The platform supports mobile or, whenever it is not the case that the tournament is not successful implies the platform has a backup, the platform is not reliable.
Rule26: Under the condition that the platform requires an app, the platform does not support mobile.
Rule27: Either the platform requires an app or the platform needs a download.
Rule28: Provided that the platform needs a download, the platform does not support mobile.
Rule29: Under the condition that the driver has a license, the vehicle has a driver.
Rule30: If the vehicle is reserved, then the vehicle is not available.
Rule31: Either the vehicle is verified or it does not have insurance.
Rule32: Provided that the vehicle requires maintenance, the vehicle passes inspection.
Rule33: Either the vehicle requires maintenance or the vehicle needs repair.
Rule34: Under the condition that the vehicle needs repair, the vehicle is not verified.
Rule35: Provided that the team requires check-in, if it is not the case that the team being ready implies the tournament is successful, then the team does not have equipment.
Rule36: Under the condition that the team needs credentials, if it is not the case that the team being ready implies the tournament is successful, then the team does not have equipment.
Rule37: Either the team has a stream or, if the team is verified, it is not registered.
Rule38: Provided that the stream uses an encoder, the stream uses software.
Rule39: Either the stream uses an encoder or, if the team makes setup, the tournament is successful.
Rule40: If the stream is redundant, then whenever the stream has a contingency, if the stream uses a secondary option, the stream has an issue or it is not live.
Rule41: Under the condition that the team has a backup plan, if the team makes setup, the tournament is successful.
Rule42: Either the team has an alternative or the team has a backup plan.
Rule43: Either the schedule is published or the tournament is successful.
Rule44: Either the schedule is approved or it is not published.

Rule45: If it is not the case that the platform supports streaming or, provided that it is not the case that the tournament is not successful implies the platform has a backup, the platform is not reliable, then the platform supports recording.
Rule46: Provided that it is not the case that if the team requires transport then the driver has a license, the vehicle is available.
Rule47: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the team is ready then the tournament is successful, the team has equipment.
Rule48: Provided that it is not the case that the match has a conflict or requires adjustment, the match is compatible.
Rule49: Under the condition that it is not the case that the match has a conflict or requires adjustment, the match is not compatible.
Rule50: If it is not the case that the team requires check-in or needs credentials, then the team is registered.
Rule51: Provided that it is not the case that the team requires check-in or needs credentials, the team is verified.
Rule52: Under the condition that it is not the case that if the stream uses an encoder then it does not use software, the stream is not compatible.
Rule53: If it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if the team requires transport then the driver has a license, the vehicle is reserved, then the vehicle is confirmed.

Rule54: Provided that it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that if the team requires transport then the driver has a license, the vehicle is reserved, the vehicle is not confirmed.
Rule55: Whenever it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if the team is ready then the tournament is successful, the team needs accommodation, the team has arrangements.

Rule56: If it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that if the team is ready then the tournament is successful, the team needs accommodation, then the team does not have arrangements.

Rule57: Provided that it is not the case that under the condition that it is not the case that if the stream uses an encoder then it does not use software, the stream is compatible, the stream is optimized.

Rule58: Under the condition that it is not the case that provided that it is not the case that if the stream uses an encoder then it does not use software, the stream is compatible, the stream is not optimized.
Rule59: If it is not the case that the tournament is not successful implies the platform has a backup, then the platform is reliable.
Rule60: If the event is not scheduled, then the event is cancelled.
Rule61: Provided that the tournament is not successful, the platform does not have a backup.
